name: .SC5 File Extension
summary: Learn about .SC5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game file used by Chris Sawyer's Locomotion, a railroad creation and simulation game; saves the starting conditions for a scenario, which requires players to build and run a transportation (locomotives, buses, trucks, etc.) business.
